connections.title: Connections in descending order of priority

en.gsm_auto-config_title: Define APN according to information from SIM-card
en.con_switch_desc: The controller checks the connection with the Internet every 5 seconds, if there is no connection, the current connection will down and the next one in the list will be activated. Further, every 60 seconds the controller will try to up one of the connections with a higher priority and, if it succeeds, will switch to it.
en.mac-pattern-message: Must be six hexadecimal byte values divided by colon (example f2:c8:14:48:d3:97)
en.interfaces_description: Configured in /etc/network/interfaces. Management via NetworkManager is available - this is a modern configuration service, support for which is currently being developed in Wiren Board. To switch to NetworkManager, delete and re-create the connection
